column1: #Text=is a small minicipality near Barcelona in Spain .
#Text=It ’s a nice village in the region of the Baix Llobregat , where there are many pine forests to walk around .
#Text=It has the tranquillity of a small town and it is near the big city .
#Text=There are many streets with home gardens .
#Text=In Santa Coloma de Cervelló municipality is located Colònia Güell — a famous and one of the most important modernist sites in the province of Barcelona .
#Text=, c/ Claudi Güell , s/n , Colònia Güell , ☏ +34936305807 , ✉ coloniaguell@adleisure.com .
#Text=For Colonia Güell take FGC trains S4 , S8 and S33 from Plaça d'Espanya , Barcelona , get off at Colonia Güell stop , then follow blue footprints painted on the pavement .
#Text=Santa Coloma de Cervelló is the next stop .
#Text=If , by chance , you are heading to Colonia Güell right from the airport by R2 Nord train , then you do n't need to go to Plaça d'Espanya to get a FGC train .
#Text=Instead you can make a change at Bellvitge RENFE stop ( the 2nd from the airport ) to Gormal FGC station ( just cross a square ) and save half an hour .
#Text=It is a tiny settlement built on-purpose around a textile factory .
#Text=The works began in 1890 and a number of renowned Catalan architects participated in this project : Antoni Gaudí , Francesc Berenguer , Joan Rubio .
#Text=Without a doubt the most important object there is :
#Text=( The crypt of the Church of Colònia Güell ) . see Visitor Service Centre hours .
#Text=Albeit unfinished and one of the most forgotten of his works , the crypt is a highlight in the creative work of Gaudí . € 7 .
#Text=A virtual tour to the crypt is available on the Internet .
#Text=( The School and the Teacher ’s House ) .
#Text=An old Catalan mansion dating back to 1622 .
#Text=Every May there ’s a festival to honor the cherries , there is an exhibition of different kinds of cherries .
#Text=The people come to live here to be quiet .
#Text=There are n’t many stores because it ’s very small but it ’s safe and friendly .
#Text=There is a tiny supermarket and a Tobacco shop at the street behind the Visitors center .
#Text=It has a square where every Sunday , many people take their children out to play .
#Text=There is a farmer 's market on Saturday mornings in Colonia Guell .
#Text=At the Colonia Guel there is a couple of restaurants and a cafe .
#Text=Also in the lobby of the public toilet facility there is a couple of vending machines with drinks and snacks .
#Text=It looks like there is no nightlife in this place .
#Text=There are no hotels here , but Barcelona is only 20 minutes away by train .
#Text=Perhaps you 'd be able find an apartment to rent here .
#Text=There a free public toilet just across the street of the Visitor 's Centre .
#Text=— Santa Coloma de Cervelló and Colonia Guell stations are located on the railroad connecting Montserrat with Barcelona .
